QuestData.Title: Proving in Arenas
QuestData.Description:
You really love conflict, eh? Good news for you - we have that in common. Combatants like yourself meet in predetermined settings to fight each other. Partake in that, and if successful you may be rewarded.
Let us see what you can prove, then return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Honor in Rated Arenas while in a Party.
